name: shodan
title: Shodan
description: Allows you to search and interact with Shodan from Raycast.
author: StoutTools

commands.name: search-host
commands.title: Search Host
commands.description: Search for host information using Shodan

commands.name: search-criteria
commands.title: Search Shodan
commands.description: Search Shodan with advanced filters and criteria

commands.name: stats
commands.title: Shodan Stats
commands.description: Get statistics about search results including country and organization breakdowns

commands.name: my-ip
commands.title: My IP
commands.description: Look up your external IP address in Shodan

commands.name: api-info
commands.title: API Info
commands.description: View your Shodan API usage and account information

commands.name: scan-ondemand
commands.title: On-Demand Scan
commands.description: Request on-demand scans of specific IPs and services

commands.name: monitored-ips
commands.title: Monitored IPs
commands.description: View your monitored IP alerts and notifications

preferences.name: shodanApiKey
preferences.title: Shodan API Key
preferences.description: Your Shodan API key (get one at https://account.shodan.io/)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run build
